title: Michel Barnier – 2020 Comments on UK/EU Trade Deal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michel Barnier, the European Commission’s Chief Negotiator on Brexit, on 24 December 2020.
content:
The clock is no longer ticking.
  *[NHSPRB]: NHS Pay Review Body

After 4.5 years of collective effort and #EU unity:
  *[NHSPRB]: NHS Pay Review Body

To preserve peace on the island of Ireland. To protect citizens and the Single Market. To build a new partnership with the UK.
  *[NHSPRB]: NHS Pay Review Body

Thank you all.
  *[NHSPRB]: NHS Pay Review Body
